question:
Which among the following events took place during the time of Lord Minto II?
1. Surat split of Congress
2. All India Muslim League established
3. Agitation against the partition of Bengal
4. Foundation stone of Victoria Memorial Hall was laid
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Surat split of Indian National Congress took place in the year 1907. All India Muslim League established in the year 1906 in Dhaka with its first leader Agha Khan. Agitation against the partition of Bengal since 1906. Foundation stone of Victoria Memorial Hall was laid in the year 1906 (4th January) by King George V. It was opened in 1921.
